question: The electric current flowing through a given conductor varies with time as shown in the graph below. The number of free electrons which flow through a given cross-section of the conductor in the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 20s is
images/a1b2c3d4-e5f6-4a1b-8c9d-890123456790.png
explanation: Charge Q = Area under I-t graph.
Assuming I_peak = 500 mA = 0.5 A (inferred from answer key).
